Test cases:

==== TEST CASE 0 ====
Angle: 00111110011010000101011010010110  // 13° = 0.2268928028 rad
Sin: 00111110011001100101010011110101    // 0.22493346 ≈ 0.2249510543
Cos: 00111111011110010111000010001111    // 0.97437376 ≈ 0.9743700648
Time: 45
